*************
Configuration
*************

The *Web Shop Woocommerce Module* uses values from settings in the
``[web_shop_woocommerce]`` section
of the :doc:`configuration file <trytond:topics/configuration>`.

.. _config-account.api_chunk:

``api_chunk``
========================

The ``api_chunk`` defines the number of records that will be fetched
from the Woocommerce API in a single call

The default value is: ``100``
